kalao.cacao.aocontrol module#

aocontrol.py is part of the KalAO Instrument Control Software (KalAO-ICS).

kalao.cacao.aocontrol.linear_low_pass_modal_gain_filter(cut_off, last_mode=None, keep_existing_flat=False, stream_name='aol1_mgainfact')#

Applies a linear low-pass filter to the ao modal gains. The gain is flat until the cut_off mode where it starts decreasing down to zero for the last mode

Parameters:

  • cut_off – mode at which the gain starts decreasing

  • last_mode – modes higher than this mode are set to 0

  • keep_existing_flat – keep the existing gain values instead of setting them to 1

  • stream_name – name of the milk stream where the gain factor are stored

Returns:

kalao.cacao.aocontrol.set_loopgain(gain)#

kalao.cacao.aocontrol.set_modal_gain(mode, factor, stream_name='aol1_mgainfact')#

Function to change the gains of the AO control modes

Parameters:

  • mode –

  • factor –

  • stream_name –

Returns:

boolean, stream_full_path
